unnormalised: Thoddi khobor! Dr. Meena Sharma hankam AIIMS, Delhint cardiology vibhagachi novi mukheli mhunn nemleant. Tinnka vhoddlea dhanyaavaad! Soglle zann sangtat ki ti hea kshetrant ut'tom asa. Tinnem Maulana Azad Medical Collegentlean MBBS kelem ani magir cardiologynt mahir zali, mhunn ti purnnponni patr asa.
normalised: Breaking news! Doctor Meena Sharma hankach Delhi-chea A-I-I-M-S-ant cardiology-chi navi mukheli mhonn nemnuk zalea. Tika vhoddleo parab! Sogllemh mhontat ti hea kshetrantli srestt asa. Tinnem Maulana Azad Medical College-antlean aplem M-B-B-S kelem ani uprant cardiology-nt vishesh ginean mellovlem, mhonn ti purnnponnan pattr asa.

unnormalised: Lokanchya tonddi asta ki ti vibhagant kaim vhoddle bodol korpachi iyejna kortasa, zoxim navim mashinam gheun tornattya doctorank training karyakrom suru korop. Te sangtat ki hospital halchalnin bhorun yetlem.
normalised: Lokachea tonddantlean aikunk mellta ki ti departmentant kaim vhoddle bodol korpak sodta, zoxe ki navim machine haddpak ani tornatteam doctoranchea training programs suru korpak. Te mhontat hospital pura uball'lolo astolo mhonn.

unnormalised: Ani, IIT Bombaytlea Prof. Rajesh Kumar hankam AI-ntlea tanchya shodhak lagun ek pratishthit purskar favo zalo. Distta ki Bharatachi buddhi global stage-ar khorench zolmholta! Tankam PM Modi svatah satkartele. Tankam vhodd yesh!
normalised: Ani Professor Rajesh Kumar-ak I-I-T Bombay-chea A-I-ntlea tchea sodhache khatir ek manacho puroskar favo zala. Distta Bharatachem buddhimbal sansarant khub zollkolam! Taka P-M Modi apnnach bhouman ditolo. Tache khatir vhodd zait!
